name: Ultimate H.O.R.S.E.
description:
Recreating classic, childhood Flash games

This month's game is Candystand.com's H.O.R.S.E. - an arcade, basketball shooter I played growing up with my friend Nate. 

If you would like to see more content and polish, click the "Support" button above! Which Flash game should I recreate next?

Instructions How it was made

View code on GitHub
